body_html:
If I revert to tensorflow 0.10 I get the error message:

TypeError: Second-order gradient for while loops not supported.

The error disappears if I switch from using tf.nn.dynamic_rnn to tf.nn.rnn, but this appears to slow things down quite a bit.
body_text:
If I revert to tensorflow 0.10 I get the error message:
TypeError: Second-order gradient for while loops not supported.

The error disappears if I switch from using tf.nn.dynamic_rnn to tf.nn.rnn, but this appears to slow things down quite a bit.
body:
If I revert to tensorflow 0.10 I get the error message:

    TypeError: Second-order gradient for while loops not supported.

The error disappears if I switch from using `tf.nn.dynamic_rnn` to `tf.nn.rnn`, but this appears to slow things down quite a bit.
